title: Female teacher, 55, sexually abused male student, 15, in Melbourne's west
text:
A female teacher has admitted sexually abusing a 15-year-old boy in a classroom.

Nicole Woods, 55, took advantage of the male student at a college in Melbourne's west, and pleaded guilty to two counts of sexual penetration of a minor on Monday.

Her victim was unable to finish school and his friends say he suffers ongoing mental trauma, 9News reported.

Scroll down for video

Nicole Woods has pleaded guilty to two counts of sexual penetration of a 15-year-old student

Woods was able to secure another teaching job at a nearby Catholic college after resigning from the school where she abused the boy.

She boasted about her new job on Facebook.

'Good news for a change. Got job, start next term @ [the Catholic college],' Woods wrote.

Her victim was unable to finish school and suffers from ongoing mental trauma (pictured: Woods outside court)

Social media: Woods boasted about her new job on Facebook

'Always wanted to work there, taken me a few years but as the saying goes "good things come to those who wait".'

The Department of Education and Training Victoria said they took 'incidents of inappropriate conduct very seriously'.

'As this matter involving a former employee is currently before the courts, it would be inappropriate to comment further,' the department said.

Woods is currently on bail and will face court again in December.

She could face up to 15 years in prison.
